events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it arrived in the wrong size. I would like to know how to get a refund or exchange.
The system identified the case as a refund request related to incorrect product delivery.
The case has been assigned to Customer Support Agent Sarah for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your jacket. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the details of the size you received versus the size you ordered?
The order number is 123456789. I ordered a Large but received a Medium, which doesn’t fit me at all.
Thanks for the info. We can either send you a replacement in Large or issue a full refund. Which option do you prefer?
I would prefer a refund, please. I don’t want to risk getting the wrong size again.
I processed your refund, which should appear in your bank account within 5-7 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since everything is resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
